DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study will be to prospectively evaluate the response of a continuous infusion of recombinant human antithrombin concentrate (rhAT) (ATRYN®) to achieve and maintain the AT activity within a specified range in adult patients that require extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (ECMO) following cardiopulmonary bypass (CPB) and cardiac surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Response of Continuous Recombinant Antithrombin Infusion in Postcardiotomy ECMO Patients
DOC.criteria: Completed cardiac surgery with Cardiopulmonary Bypass and subsequently placed on venoarterial (VA) Extracorporeal Membrane Oxygenation (ECMO) support at any point during the ongoing hospitalization Serum Antithrombin < 60%. Heart transplantation during ongoing hospitalization Excessive bleeding (300 ml/hr of chest tube drainage for 2 consecutive hours) Weight < 40 kg Allergy to goat products Anticoagulation with a direct thrombin inhibitor Religious exception to blood products Hypothermia (< 34°C)
